verses.verse: He that <S%H6327>dashes<s%> in pieces is <S%H5927>come<s%> up <S%H5921>before<s%> your <S%H6440>face:<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> the <S%H4694>fortification,<s%> <S%H6822>watch<s%> the <S%H1870>way,<s%> make your <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H2388>strong,<s%> <S%H553>fortify<s%> your <S%H3581>power<s%> <S%H3966>mightily.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7725>turned<s%> away the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> as the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> for the <S%H1238>emptiers<s%> have <S%H1238>emptied<s%> them out, and <S%H7843>marred<s%> their <S%H2156>vine<s%> <S%H2156>branches.<s%>

The <S%H4043>shield<s%> of his <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men is made <S%H119>red,<s%> the <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> are in <S%H8529>scarlet:<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> shall be with <S%H784>flaming<s%> <S%H6393>torches<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H3559>preparation,<s%> and the <S%H1265>fir<s%> trees shall be terribly <S%H7477>shaken.<s%>

The <S%H7393>chariots<s%> shall <S%H1984>rage<s%> in the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> they shall <S%H8264>jostle<s%> one against <S%H8264>another<s%> in the <S%H7339>broad<s%> ways: they shall <S%H4758>seem<s%> like <S%H3940>torches,<s%> they shall <S%H7323>run<s%> like the <S%H1300>lightning.<s%>

He shall <S%H2142>recount<s%> his <S%H117>worthies:<s%> they shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in their <S%H1979>walk;<s%> they shall make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to the <S%H2346>wall<s%> thereof, and the <S%H5526>defense<s%> shall be <S%H3559>prepared.<s%>
The <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> shall be <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and the <S%H1964>palace<s%> shall be <S%H4127>dissolved.<s%>

And <S%H5324>Huzzab<s%> shall be led <S%H1540>away<s%> <S%H1540>captive,<s%> she shall be <S%H5927>brought<s%> up, and her <S%H519>maids<s%> shall <S%H5090>lead<s%> her as with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3123>doves,<s%> <S%H8608>beating<s%> on their <S%H3824>breasts.<s%>

But <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> is of <S%H3117>old<s%> like a <S%H1295>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water:<s%> yet they shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> away. <S%H5975>Stand,<s%> <S%H5975>stand,<s%> shall they cry; but <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H6437>look<s%> <S%H6437>back.<s%>

<S%H962>Take<s%> you the <S%H962>spoil<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H962>spoil<s%> of <S%H2091>gold:<s%> for there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H8498>store<s%> and <S%H3519>glory<s%> out of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H3627>furniture.<s%>

She is <S%H950>empty,<s%> and <S%H4003>void,<s%> and <S%H1110>waste:<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melts,<s%> and the <S%H1290>knees<s%> <S%H6375>smite<s%> together, and <S%H2479>much<s%> <S%H2479>pain<s%> is in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of them <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H6289>blackness.<s%>

<S%H346>Where<s%> is the <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> of the <S%H738>lions,<s%> and the feeding <S%H4829>place<s%> of the <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H739>lion,<s%> even the old <S%H3833>lion,<s%> <S%H1980>walked,<s%> and the <S%H738>lion's<s%> <S%H1482>whelp,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> made them <S%H2729>afraid?<s%>

The <S%H738>lion<s%> did <S%H2963>tear<s%> in pieces <S%H1767>enough<s%> for his <S%H1484>whelps,<s%> and <S%H2614>strangled<s%> for his <S%H3833>lionesses,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> his <S%H2356>holes<s%> with <S%H2964>prey,<s%> and his <S%H4585>dens<s%> with <S%H2966>shred.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and I will <S%H1197>burn<s%> her <S%H7393>chariots<s%> in the <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> your <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lions:<s%> and I will <S%H3772>cut<s%> off your <S%H2964>prey<s%> from the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H4397>messengers<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H8085>heard.<s%>
